text: in this video you'll see how to
distribute licenses from AWS Marketplace
to your AWS organization using the
managed entitlement feature of AWS
license manager
this feature enables you to distribute
track and activate licenses to end users
across AWS accounts by using individual
or organization account IDs
let's start by setting up the necessary
services and permissions
ensure you have AWS organizations
enabled and have at least one AWS member
account
in Marketplace you must create the
integration with license manager this
allows Marketplace to create and modify
license grants and license manager
access the AWS Marketplace console as an
admin in the management account
from the left sidebar choose settings
choose configure integration beside AWS
organization integration
choose the check box next to enable
trusted access across your organization
as well as AWS Marketplace license
Management Service linked role for this
account
choose create integration
let's go through the one-time setup of
license manager
access the license manager console as an
admin in the management account select
the start using AWS license manager
button
you'll be prompted to create the
required permissions to manage licenses
select a grant AWS license manager the
required permissions and select Grant
permissions
lastly let's link the organization to
license manager this step creates
service linked roles in the member
accounts and enables Auto Acceptance of
distributed grants
access the license manager console as an
admin in the management account
from the left sidebar choose settings
select link AWS organization accounts
and follow the prompts to link the
accounts
now that we have everything set up let's
walk through how to subscribe to a
product and distribute a license through
license manager
let's head to Marketplace And subscribe
to an offering
next head to the license manager console
and navigate to the granted licenses
page
select the license associated with the
software we want to distribute click on
create Grant and provide the AWS account
IDs that need access to the software
since I want to share this with all
accounts in my organization I input the
organization ID
create the grant license manager will
create the license Grant in the member
account
under the grant section select the newly
created Grant and click activate if you
want to replace existing grants for the
same product with the new license grant
for the recipient choose yes
now let's log into a member account and
validate the license has been granted
head to AWS Marketplace subscriptions in
the AWS console and we can see that a
new subscription was shared with the
member account select manage we are now
able to immediately start using the
newly granted product
you've just seen how to distribute
licenses from AWS Marketplace using the
managed entitlements feature of AWS
license manager
you can learn more about this topic in
the description of this video
